name: Map Gen
explanations: Drag&drop to move around the map and click on a room to highlight it
This was used in some gamejams like Frog Quest

name: Capture
explanations: Move your mouse while holding down left click to draw on screen
Make a circle around a shape without touching it to make it disappear
This was used in some projects like Aethra's Katsis Catcher

name: Fishing
explanations: Move your cursor to move your hook until a fish is foccused on it
When a fish is bitting, move your mouse to keep it on your target until you capture it

name: Dialogue
explanations: This is used in most projects and jam where I need to display text in a dialogue kind of way

name: save
explanations: Unlocking an achievement and coming back should keep it unlocked, this is done by the persistency module!

name: trophy
explanations: Play the others games to unlock these!
